price: 75.Kaadu qaran kee baaxoh addal ginok qellitti ittaamay Yallak qellitta matan Yallih xaqul baxxaqqa-le kitaabih (lawcal macfuuz) addal tanih akke waytek.
arabic: وَمَا مِنۡ غَآئِبَةٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا فِي كِتَٰبٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā min ghāibatin fī al-samāi wal-arḍi illā fī kitābin mubīnin
